name: Citizen
description: The citizen is the core of the town team, who has no ability in the night phase, he will win the game when he has eliminated all the mafia members as well as the neutral killers from the game.

name: Invulnerable
description: Invulnerable is one of the characters of the group of citizens who will be safe from being killed by basic attack just for one night.

name: Traitor
description: The traitor is a member of the citizen team, if she is attacked by the mafia team, he is not killed, and from the next night of the game, he wakes up with the mafia members by betraying the town team and becomes a mafia.

name: Student
description: The student is one of the characters of the group of citizens, and if he is killed, the game manager announces the death of the student and the possibility of expelling two players on the current day.

name: Detective
description: You will know if your target is suspicious, except for the Godfather.

name: Lookout
description: Watch one person at night to see who visits them.

name: Tracker
description: Track one person at night to see who they visit.

name: Autopsist
description: Autopsist is one of the characters of the group of citizens who can choose one of the people killed in the previous nights every night in order to be aware of his or her role.

name: Mason
description: The Masons are a group of players that don't know each other's roles but are allowed to communicate privately with each other outside of the game thread.

name: Sniper
description: If your target is attacked, both you and your attacker will die instead. If you successfully protect someone, you can't be saved from death. Your counterattack ignores night immunity.

name: Veteran
description: While on alert you can not be killed at night. If anyone visits you while you are on alert they will be shot. You can only go on alert 3 times. You are immune to role blocks.

name: Jailor
description: You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.  You may choose to execute your prisoner. The jailed target cannot perform their night ability. While jailed the prisoner is safe from all attacks.

name: Gunsmith
description: The Gunsmith cannot pass guns to himself. The player receiving the gun will be informed of this at the beginning of the next day phase, but they will not learn who they received it from. They will also not learn if they received a fake gun (see Fabricator). A different, equally popular, version of this role is a Gunsmith that passes out regular guns that can only be used and resolved normally at night without any chance or risk of the shooter being revealed if they use the gun.

name: VampireHunter
description: If you find a Vampire you will stake them in the heart. If a Vampire visits you they will be staked. You can hear Vampires at night.If you kill all Vampires you will become a Vigilante.

name: Doctor
description: You may only heal yourself once. You will know if your target is attacked.

name: Hero
description: Hero is one of the characters of the group of citizens who has the ability to protect a person against any attack in the night phase.

name: Bodyguard
description: You will know if your target is suspicious, except for the Godfather.

name: Crusader
description: Grant your target Powerful defense. You will know if your target is attacked. You attack one person who visits your target on the same night. You do not attack vampires, but you do block their attacks. You will know if your target is attacked.

name: Trapper
description: Traps take one day to build. Traps can be torn down by selecting yourself at night. You may only have one Trap out at a time.

name: Reflector
description: The Reflector may each night give someone a reflection shield, which will cause anyone targeting the Reflector's target to have their actions reflected back onto themselves. The reflection shield lasts only one night.

name: Priest
description: The Priest is one of the characters of the group of citizens who wakes up every night after the silencer and chooses one person, if that person is chosen by the silencer on the same night, she will be saved.

name: Escort
description: Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. You are immune to role blocks. If you target a Serial Killer, they will attack you.

name: Mayor
description: Once you have revealed yourself as the Mayor your vote counts as 3 votes. You may not be healed once you have revealed. Once revealed you can't whisper, or be whispered to.

name: Retributionist
description: Create zombies from dead true-hearted Town players. Use their abilities on your second target. Each zombie can be used once before it rots.

name: Judge
description: The Judge may just one night choose to kill someone who was on the lynch bandwagon during the most recent day phase.

name: Conjurer
description: Conjurer is one of the characters of the group of citizens who wakes up every night and has the ability to summon any of the dead in the game. The summoned person can play his role on the same night if he wishes
